select poll_seq.nextval from dual
insert into poll values( #{poll_num}, #{poll_writer}, #{poll_type}, #{poll_title}, #{poll_contents}, sysdate, TO_DATE(#{poll_etime},'YYYY-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'))

select poll_question_seq.nextval from dual
insert into poll_question values( #{poll_question_num}, #{poll_num},#{poll_question_text}, #{poll_multiple},#{poll_num_question_num})

select poll_joiner_seq.nextval from dual
insert into poll_joiner values( #{poll_joiner_num},#{poll_num},#{employee_no})
mapper.select: select * from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(POLL POLL_PK) INDEX(EMPLOYEE EMPLOYEE_PK)*/ rownum rn,p.*,e.name,d.department_name from poll p inner join employee e on p.poll_writer = e.employee_no join department d on e.department_id = d.department_id where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by poll_num DESC) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
select p.*,e.name,d.department_name from poll p inner join employee e on p.poll_writer = e.employee_no join department d on e.department_id = d.department_id where p.poll_num = #{poll_num}
select * from poll_question where poll_num = #{poll_num} order by poll_question_num
select i.* from poll_item i INNER JOIN poll_question q ON i.poll_question_num = q.poll_question_num where q.poll_question_num = #{poll_question_num} order by poll_item_num

select a.*, j.employee_no from POLL_ANSWER a inner JOIN POLL_JOINER j on j.POLL_JOINER_NUM = a.POLL_JOINER_NUM where poll_answer_num > 0 AND poll_question_num = #{poll_question_num} AND employee_no = #{employee_no} AND poll_item_num > 0 order by poll_answer_num
mapper.update: update poll set poll_type = ${poll_type}, poll_title = ${poll_title}, poll_contents = #{poll_contents} where poll_num = ${poll_num}

update poll_question set poll_num = ${poll_num}, poll_question_text = ${poll_question_text}, poll_multiple = ${poll_multiple}, poll_num_question_num = ${poll_num_question_num} where poll_question_num = ${poll_question_num}
update poll_item set poll_question_num = ${poll_question_num}, poll_item_text = ${poll_item_text} where poll_item_num = ${poll_item_num}

update poll_answer set poll_item_num = #{poll_item_num}, poll_joiner_num = #{poll_joiner_num}, poll_question_num = #{poll_question_num}, poll_select_num = #{poll_select_num} where poll_answer_num = #{poll_answer_num}
